text: Luciano Comaschi (3 July 1931 â€“ 30 April 2019) was an Italian football and manager. He played as a full back. He played for Brescia and Napoli. He also played for Italy at youth international level. He was born in Montichiari. Comaschi died in Rome on 30 April 2019, at the age of 87. ==References== ==Other websites== * Luciano Comaschi at Enciclopedia del Calcio Category:1931 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Footballers from Lombardy Category:Italian football managers
title: Luciano Comaschi
